languages.text: Пара часов, ушедших на поиски, не привели ни к чему — компоненты "Рожденного в огне" либо повреждены, либо непригодны для демонтажа и транспортировки на корабль Вольного Торговца.

traits.locale_text: Пара часов, ушедших на поиски, не привели ни к чему — компоненты "Рожденного в огне" либо повреждены, либо непригодны для демонтажа и транспортировки на корабль Вольного Торговца.

languages.text: After two hours of searching, the team had nothing to show for their efforts — the Fireborn's components were either damaged or unsuitable for dismantling and transportation back to the Rogue Trader's vessel.
languages.original_text: Пара часов, ушедших на поиски, не привели ни к чему — компоненты "Рожденного в огне" либо повреждены, либо непригодны для демонтажа и транспортировки на корабль Вольного Торговца.

traits.locale_text: After two hours of searching, the team had nothing to show for their efforts — the Fireborn's components were either damaged or unsuitable for dismantling and transportation back to the Rogue Trader's vessel.

After two hours of searching, the team had nothing to show for their efforts — the Fireborn's components were either damaged or unsuitable for dismantling and transportation back to the Rogue Trader's vessel.

After two hours of searching, the team had nothing to show for their efforts — the Fireborn's components were either damaged or unsuitable for dismantling and transportation back to the Rogue Trader's vessel.

After two hours of searching, the team had nothing to show for their efforts — the Fireborn's components were either damaged or unsuitable for dismantling and transportation back to the Rogue Trader's vessel.

languages.text: Tras dos horas de registro, el equipo no recibió nada por sus esfuerzos: los componentes de la Nacida del Fuego estaban demasiado dañados o no eran aptos para su desmontado y traslado a la nave de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente.
languages.original_text: After two hours of searching, the team had nothing to show for their efforts — the Fireborn's components were either damaged or unsuitable for dismantling and transportation back to the Rogue Trader's vessel.

traits.locale_text: Tras dos horas de registro, el equipo no recibió nada por sus esfuerzos: los componentes de la Nacida del Fuego estaban demasiado dañados o no eran aptos para su desmontado y traslado a la nave de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente.

languages.text: 经过两个小时的搜索之后，这支搜索队一无所获。“烈焰之子”号的部件要么已经损坏，要么并不适合拆解搬运。
languages.original_text: After two hours of searching, the team had nothing to show for their efforts — the Fireborn's components were either damaged or unsuitable for dismantling and transportation back to the Rogue Trader's vessel.

traits.locale_text: 经过两个小时的搜索之后，这支搜索队一无所获。“烈焰之子”号的部件要么已经损坏，要么并不适合拆解搬运。

languages.text: 2時間の捜索の後、チームはその労力に見合う成果は何も得られなかた。ファイアボーンの部品は損傷しているものや、解体して自由開拓者の船に持っていくには適さないものばかりだ。
languages.original_text: After two hours of searching, the team had nothing to show for their efforts — the Fireborn's components were either damaged or unsuitable for dismantling and transportation back to the Rogue Trader's vessel.

traits.locale_text: 2時間の捜索の後、チームはその労力に見合う成果は何も得られなかた。ファイアボーンの部品は損傷しているものや、解体して自由開拓者の船に持っていくには適さないものばかりだ。

languages.text: Nach zweistündiger Suche hatte das Team nichts vorzuweisen – die Komponenten der Fireborn waren entweder beschädigt oder ungeeignet zur Demontage und den Rücktransport zum Schiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}.
languages.original_text: After two hours of searching, the team had nothing to show for their efforts — the Fireborn's components were either damaged or unsuitable for dismantling and transportation back to the Rogue Trader's vessel.

traits.locale_text: Nach zweistündiger Suche hatte das Team nichts vorzuweisen – die Komponenten der Fireborn waren entweder beschädigt oder ungeeignet zur Demontage und den Rücktransport zum Schiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}.

languages.text: Après deux heures de fouilles, l'équipe dut se résoudre à rentrer bredouille. Soit les composants du Flamboyant étaient endommagés, soit ils ne pouvaient pas être démantelés et transportés au vaisseau {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.
languages.original_text: After two hours of searching, the team had nothing to show for their efforts — the Fireborn's components were either damaged or unsuitable for dismantling and transportation back to the Rogue Trader's vessel.

traits.locale_text: Après deux heures de fouilles, l'équipe dut se résoudre à rentrer bredouille. Soit les composants du Flamboyant étaient endommagés, soit ils ne pouvaient pas être démantelés et transportés au vaisseau {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.

languages.text: İki saatlik araştırma sonucunda takımın çabalarının nafile olduğu ortaya çıktı. Ateşten'deki malzemeler ya hasarlıydı ya da parçalara ayrılıp Hür Tacir'in gemisine taşınmaya elverişsizdi.
languages.original_text: After two hours of searching, the team had nothing to show for their efforts — the Fireborn's components were either damaged or unsuitable for dismantling and transportation back to the Rogue Trader's vessel.

traits.locale_text: İki saatlik araştırma sonucunda takımın çabalarının nafile olduğu ortaya çıktı. Ateşten'deki malzemeler ya hasarlıydı ya da parçalarına ayrılıp Hür Tacir'in gemisine taşınmak için elverişsizdi.
